perturbation.original_text: The invoices will be issued by EIT at the start of each term. Such invoice must be paid by the customer within 45 days of the date on which the invoice is issued.
perturbation.changed_text: The invoices will be issued by EIT at the start of each term. Such invoice must be paid by the customer within 30 days of the date on which the invoice is issued.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline from 45 days to 30 days. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the actual deadline for invoice payments, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
The present Agreement is effective as from 1 January 2009. It is established by calendar year and renewed tacitly every year.

The Agreement rests, for all that, cancellable at any time by any of the parties before the expiry date of the Agreement or any of its renewals, upon three months prior written notice.
perturbation.changed_text:
The present Agreement is effective as from 1 January 2009. It is established by calendar year and renewed tacitly every year.

The Agreement rests, for all that, cancellable at any time by the customer with immediate effect; EIT requires three months prior written notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by allowing the customer to cancel at any time with immediate effect while EIT is bound by the original term of three months prior written notice, creating uncertainty about the actual termination requirements for each party.

perturbation.original_text:
In case the Customer cancels the Agreement in accordance with Articles 13.1, 13.2, EIT will pay the Customer the amount of 3.000 €, for the non observance of the Agreement of which it is responsible.

In case of termination of this Agreement by the Customer according to Article 13.5, the Customer will pay EIT the amount of 3.000 €.
perturbation.changed_text:
In case the Customer cancels the Agreement in accordance with Articles 13.1, 13.2, the Customer will pay EIT the amount of 3.000 €, for the non observance of the Agreement of which it is responsible.

In case of termination of this Agreement by the Customer according to Article 13.5, the EIT will pay the customer the amount of 3.000 €.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by reversing which party owes the 3000€ payment on termination, based on which article the agreement is cancelled under. It creates uncertainty about whether the Customer pays EIT, or EIT pays the Customer.
